definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: You need to show some grit if you want to succeed in the tough world of business.
sentences.chinese: 你要是想在残酷商战中胜出的话，就得拿出点勇气来。

sentences.english: The Neimoidian life-cycle has contributed much to their cutthroat business acumen.
sentences.chinese: 内莫迪亚人把一生的大部分时间都献给了残酷的商战。

sentences.english: "Comercial Fight" was the center of his economical thoughts which was very practical.
sentences.chinese: “商战”是他经济思想的核心，充满浓厚的实践色彩。

definition: Vertical and Horizontal Alliance, opposing stratagems devised by the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
lit. to devise battle plan in a tent (idiom)/fig. planning strategies
to advance gradually and entrench oneself at every step/to consolidate at every step
The Thirty-Six Stratagems, a Chinese essay used to illustrate a series of stratagems used in politics, war, and in civil interaction/all the possible schemes and stratagems
art of politics/political tricks (often derog.)/power play/to play at politics/underhand trickery
